tagline.en: THE PREMIER EOS BLOCK PRODUCER CANDIDATE

introduce.en: EOS Land will change the way people look at blockchain by helping to define a new generation of innovation and transparency. Backed by stable financial Canadian institutions, EOS Land will be the first entity to be a fully audited and regulated Block Producer. Alongside its focus on innovation, EOS Land is committed to following the core tenets of the EOS constitution to enhance Education, Community, and Technology.
introduce.cn: EOS Land将通过帮助定义新一代的创新和透明度，改变人们关注区块链的方式。 在稳定的加拿大金融机构的支持下，EOS Land将成为首家获得全面审计和监管的区块制造商的实体。 除了专注于创新之外，EOS Land致力于遵循EOS组织的核心宗旨，以加强教育，社区和技术。
